billEvents.eventText: referred to libraries and education technology

title: Provides for an annual $50,000 appropriation to the Rochester public library
summary: Provides for an annual $50,000 appropriation to the Rochester public library for a continuity of service project.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         2653

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 19, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by M. of A. MORELLE, MAISEL -- read once and referred to the
         Committee on Libraries and Education Technology

       AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to  providing  monies  to
         the Rochester public library for a continuity of service project

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Subdivision 1 of  section  273  of  the  education  law  is
    2  amended by adding a new paragraph o to read as follows:
    3    O.  IN  ADDITION TO ANY OTHER SUMS PROVIDED TO SUCH LIBRARY THE SUM OF
    4  FIFTY THOUSAND DOLLARS SHALL BE MADE AVAILABLE TO THE  ROCHESTER  PUBLIC
    5  LIBRARY FOR A CONTINUITY OF SERVICE PROJECT APPROVED BY THE COMMISSIONER
    6  FOR EACH CALENDAR YEAR.
    7    S 2. This act shall take effect April 1, 2012.







        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD06450-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to providing monies to the Rochester public library for a continuity of service project
